articles.title: Declaration of G8 Summit Pulling up DPRK over Satellite Launch Refuted
articles.content:
Declaration of G8 Summit Pulling up DPRK over Satellite Launch Refuted 
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA slamming the declaration of the G8 Summit for finding fault with the DPRK:
					 We decisively denounce and totally reject the declaration of the summit held in the U.S. recently which unreasonably pulled up the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear deterrence for self-defence. 
					
					 Absolutely intolerable is G8's reckless political provocation to violate the sacred sovereignty of the DPRK steeped in the bad habit of supporting the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK in disregard of justice and truth. 
					
					 We will bravely frustrate all the obstructions of the hostile forces and continue legitimately exercising our sovereign right to launch satellites to meet the indispensable requirements for building an economic power. 
					
					 We had access to nuclear deterrence for self-defence because of the hostile policy of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK by force and we will expand and bolster it nonstop as long as this hostile policy goes on.
					
					 There is still the way for settling the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula peacefully through dialogue and negotiations, but this will never be paved unless the U.S. rolls up its hostile policy towards the DPRK in practice. 
					
					 Several weeks ago, we informed the U.S. side of the fact that we are restraining ourselves in real actions though we are no longer bound to the February 29 DPRK-U.S. agreement, taking the concerns voiced by the U.S. into consideration for the purpose of ensuring the  peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula necessary for focusing every effort on the peaceful development. 
					
					 From the beginning, we did not envisage such a military measure as a nuclear test as we planned to launch a scientific and technical satellite for peaceful purposes. 
					
					 There is a saying "he that lives ill, fear follows him." The U.S. which spearheaded such an illegal action as pulling up the DPRK over its launch of a satellite for peaceful purposes is talking about what it called "nuclear test" in a bid to incite confrontation. 
					
					 If the U.S. persists in its moves to ratchet up sanctions and pressure upon us despite our peace-loving efforts, we will be left with no option but to take counter-measures for self-defence.

articles.title: Congratulations to Serbian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Serbian President 
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Tomislav Nikolic upon his election as president of Serbia on May 22.
					 Kim in the message wished the Serbian President success in his work for the stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae on Devotedly Implementing Order of Supreme Commander
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae on Devotedly Implementing Order of Supreme Commander
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army,  learned bout the renovation project at the Mangyongdae Fun Fair on May 22. 
					 Soldier-builders who are ready to flatten even mountains and empty a sea, if ordered by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, are now waging an all-out drive to turn the above-said funfair into a more modern recreation ground for people as required by the era of Songun as it is associated with the leadership provided by President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Going round the funfair and wading pool under renovation, he acquainted himself in detail with the project and appreciated the labor successes soldier-builders have achieved by bringing about miracles and innovations in the spirit of "at one go."
					
					 He stressed the need for them to satisfactorily ensure materials need for the project, complete the project ahead of schedule, bearing deep in mind Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un's noble outlook on the people, and took steps for devotedly implementing his order.
					
					 After looking round bedrooms of soldiers, he learned about supply service. He called on the commanding officers to take warm care of soldiers' living as their elder brothers and sisters would do in hearty response to the party's slogan "Let the Whole Army Become True Comrades-in-Arms!" 
					
					 On May 21 he looked round apartment houses and various catering facilities in the area of Mansudae nearing completion. He called for completing the construction on the principle of fully ensuring the convenience of the people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Unification Minister's Ambition for "Unification of Systems"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Unification Minister's Ambition for "Unification of Systems"
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Ryu U Ik, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, staged the burlesque of making a "jar for unification" at a ceramic baking site in North Kyongsang Province. The traitor said that the "jar for unification" is aimed to symbolically show the "donation of holy funds" as part of preparations for "unification". 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Ryu talked rubbish while playing the role of a potter. This was aimed to lure the public sentiment and realize the ambition for "unification of systems" by abusing the word "unification".
					
					 The "jar for unification" is actually aimed to raise money needed for the "unification under liberal democracy".
					
					 Ryu made the jar himself, a vicious challenge to the unanimous desire of the compatriots to achieve independent reunification by our nation itself, and an open declaration to make a showdown with the DPRK to the last.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group has made desperate efforts to hurt the sacred system of the DPRK while talking about "funds used for the celebrations of the Day of the Sun". The group is now working hard to realize the ambition for "unification of systems" by emptying the people's pockets.
					
					 What enrages us is that Ryu mocked and insulted the compatriots by mentioning the "collection of will" and "fervor" for "unification".
					
					 Intolerable is that he dare related his criminal idea of "unification of systems" with the desire of the compatriots for independent reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Japan's Reinvasion Moves Disclosed
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Japan's Reinvasion Moves Disclosed 
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Japanese and south Korean military authorities are working hard to conclude military agreements the main content of which is the exchange of information concerning nuclear and missile programs of the DPRK.
					 A bylined commentary of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says it is literally aimed to provoke a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The information cooperation between Japan and south Korea is a product of the concerted efforts made by the forces hostile to the DPRK who seek a way out in aggression and war, the paper noted, and went on:
					
					 It is obvious that the conclusion of the military agreements would lead to intensified DPRK-targeted military intelligence and furthermore, a war against it.
					
					 The conclusion of the agreements can be seen as a dangerous military measure of putting the finishing touches to the triangular alliance being knocked into shape among the U.S., Japan and south Korea. It is a provocation hamstringing the sincere efforts of the DPRK and the international community for the detente of the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia
					
					 The present situation shows the Japanese militarists are beside themselves to realize their past dream of the "Greater east Asia co-prosperity sphere" by launching the reinvasion of Korea to start conquering whole of Asia backed by intelligence activities. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are following with vigilance the vicious attempt of the Japanese reactionaries to stage a comeback to Korea. Japan's anti-DPRK racket will bring it only bitter defeat.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's New "North Strategy" under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's New "North Strategy" under Fire
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The group of traitor Lee Myung Bak is staging the anti-DPRK campaign talking about "new method of approaching the north". This is the last-ditch efforts of those perturbed by the invincible might of the DPRK. 
					 A bylined article of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this, and goes on:
					
					 The core of Lee group's new "north strategy" is little different from the theory of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars". It has become more crafty and vicious in its contents and method.
					
					 The Lee group felt that its original "north policy" would never help it check the vigorous advance of the DPRK nor realize the ambition for "unification of systems". It, therefore, cooked up new "north strategy" to dig itself out of the predicament. It, talking about "expenses", bribed all the riff-raffs and let loose invectives slandering the DPRK, while citing "human rights", thereby pursuing the confrontation policy in a craftier manner. 
					
					 Through such despicable method, the Lee group eyes to defame the dignified DPRK in the international arena and tighten the siege to it with sanctions. It also seeks to undermine the trust of the people in the socialist system and break the single-minded unity of the army and people of the DPRK.  
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK value their dignity and sovereignty dearer than their lives. 
					
					 It is the foolish acts of poor idiots to try to shake the people's mindset with the "issue of expenses" and undermine the powerful socialist system with "human rights" racket. 
					
					 Their reckless acts provoking the DPRK with the "new method of approaching the north" are escalating distrust and confrontation between the north and the south and bringing grave consequence of increasing the danger of a nuclear war in the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: IFBA Referee Clinic Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
IFBA Referee Clinic Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A referee clinic, sponsored by the International Federation of Basketball Association, was held at the Sports Science Library and the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street in Pyongyang on May 19-20.
					 The clinic, which broke into theories and practices, brought together referees, coaches of sports groups and teachers at juvenile sports schools.
					
					 It dealt with revised regulations of basketball games and signaling of referees.
					
					 The clinic was officiated by IFBA Sports Director Lubomir Kotleba.

articles.title: The Military Band of the Korean left to festival
articles.content:
The Military Band of the Korean left to festival
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Military Band of the Korean People's Army led by Colonel Kang Il Nam left here Tuesday to participate in the first international military band festival of the Far Eastern Region to be held in Khabarovsk of Russia and visit Amur Region.  
					A delegation of the Science and Encyclopedia Publishing House led by Director General and Editor-in-Chief Ji Yu Gon left here on the same day to visit China.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Pays Tribute
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Pays Tribute
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Vietnamese paper Nhan Dan headed by Editor-in-Chief Thuan Huu on Monday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay tribute.
					 They made a bow to the statues after laying bouquets before them.
					
					 The delegation arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Former and Incumbent Leading Members of Pomminryon Disclose Injustice of "SL"
articles.content:
Former and Incumbent Leading Members of Pomminryon Disclose Injustice of "SL" 
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The chairman, former secretary general and chairman for information of the South Headquarters of Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) asserted the injustice of the fascist "security law" at a hearing on an appeal held at Seoul High Court on May 18. 
					 They said that the prosecution and Intelligence Service define the north as an enemy, but they have made joint efforts to achieve reunification through concerted efforts of the south, north and overseas sides, regarding the north as a member of the same nation in order to co-exist and live together with it for future. 
					
					 They declared that all their activities were conducted to implement the south-north joint declarations. 
					
					 Chairman Ri Kyu Jae in his final statement said that now the spirit of achieving peaceful reunification together with the north is mounting across south Korea. 
					
					 But, the Lee Myung Bak regime intentionally denied the south-north joint declarations for national reconciliation and unity and pushed the south-north relations to the brink of war, he said, and went on:
					
					 It is the "security law" that backs this rule of traitors by law. 
					
					 It is on the strength of this evil law that the Lee's ruling quarters are detaining the progressive forces after unconditionally branding them as leftists for the mere reason that they have protested against their moves for confrontation, irregularities and corruption, pro-U.S. sycophantic unpopular rule and tyrannical politics.
					
					 It is unreasonable to hand down the outdated "security law" to posterity, he stated, urging the court authorities to make a right decision and repeal the law at the crossroads of peace and war, reunification and permanent division.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un's Outlook on People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un's Outlook on People 
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Officials should devotedly work for the benefits of popular masses -- this is the noble outlook what general secretary Kim Jong Il had and the dear respected Kim Jong Un has for the people.
					 It is the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea to make the Korean people lead an enjoyable life under socialism.
					
					 Om Sok Chol, a worker at the East Pyongyang Thermal-power Plant, told KCNA:
					
					 "I was honored to appreciate the Unhasu concert at the People's Theater in the presence of the dear respected Kim Jong Un on May Day. 
					
					 I saw him sitting on a chair, little different to others, to enjoy the concert together with Pyongyangites.
					
					 He acknowledged the songs performed by on-lookers with applauses before anybody else. 
					
					 I can not forget the privileged time all my life."
					
					 Jang Kuk Il, deputy director of the Taesongsan Guidance Bureau, who took part in the Friday-labor, said:
					
					 "I saw on TV the dear respected Kim Jong Un on his inspection of the Mangyongdae Funfair. There, he scolded its officials for being bereft of proper spirit of serving the people. His scolding seems to allude to me.
					
					 I will redouble my efforts to serve the people, following Kim Jong Il's patriotism."

articles.title: Korean Costumes Designs Get Popularity
articles.content:
Korean Costumes Designs Get Popularity
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Put on display at the State Industrial Art Exhibition, held on the occasion of President Kim Il Sung's 100th birth anniversary, were Korean costumes designs and their samples.
					 The exhibits were presented by Pak Myong Sun, a painter at the Korean Industrial Art Studio.
					
					 She told KCNA:
					
					 "Various patterns of flowers are embroidered on red-color cloth to suit likings of young women.
					
					 I selected dark blue-color chima (skirt) and white-color jogori (coat) for middle-aged women. They are patterned with pieces of clouds in waves, which are the traditional Korean costumes decoration. 
					
					 100 blossoms of wild roses and cherry are figured around peony flower on red-color chima.
					
					 Colors of flower patterns are contrary to ground ones.
					
					 The skirt was manufactured, consisting of six pieces of cloth to ensure easy movements.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un visited the exhibition in April this year and was satisfied with the exhibits."

articles.title: WPK Secretary Meets New Russian Ambassador
articles.content:
WPK Secretary Meets New Russian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Tuesday met and had a talk with Alexandr Timonin, new Russian ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Birthday Spread Sent to Centenarian
articles.content:
Birthday Spread Sent to Centenarian 
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to woman centenarian Ri Kap Sun residing in the 30th neighborhood unit of Haeun-dong, Kaesong City. 
					 She was born as the first daughter of a day-laborer in Koryo-dong, Kaesong City. She lost her parents in her early years and suffered all sorts of maltreatment and contempt under the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists and the military occupation by the U.S. imperialists. 
					
					 Only after she came to the DPRK founded by President Kim Il Sung she could lead a genuine life. She has six sons and many grandchildren. 
					
					 She worked as a nurse of nursery for decades. After becoming pensioner she worked at the workshop for light workers till she turned 80. 
					
					 She likes boiled rice and cereals, vegetables and fruits. She is optimistic and in good health. 
					
					 She asks her children and grandchildren to work hard for the socialist country.

articles.title: Jeju Island Governor's Suppression of Demonstrators Denounced by S. Korea Organization
articles.content:
Jeju Island Governor's Suppression of Demonstrators Denounced by S. Korea Organization
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Kangjong Village Society of south Korea denounced the provincial governor's fascist suppression at a press conference outside the governor's office building on May 18.
					 The governor prodded police and gangsters into suppressing the activists who called for the halt to the construction of the naval base and taking away four people, the society noted, and went on:
					
					 The governor siding with the authorities indifferent to the livelihood of the citizens is not needed any more.
					
					 The society would wage an unflinching struggle to force the governor disregarding the people's demand to step down while strongly protesting the construction of the Jeju naval base, it said.

articles.title: Patriotism Based on Noble View on Posterity
articles.content:
Patriotism Based on Noble View on Posterity
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il was a peerless patriot with the warmest love for the posterity.
					 In his lifetime he had done all he could do for the rosy future of the country and the happiness of posterity, with the view on life that one should live not merely for today but for tomorrow.
					
					 His whole life was run through with the revolutionary spirit of service for the future.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism based on the noble outlook on the future and posterity means devoted efforts for the prosperity and wellbeing of the nation.
					
					 His noble patriotism inspired the Korean people in the efforts to build many monumental edifices and give face-lifting to the whole country. Those edifices include institutes of science and education, centers for entertainment, Mansudae area, Huichon Power Station and Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm.
					
					 Thanks to his high intention that many monumental edifices should be built in a perfect way for posterity, epoch-making changes had been made in the DPRK to translate its people's cherished desires into reality.
					
					 Korea, which had to suffer hardships a century ago, has now turned into a strong country based on single-minded unity and a nuclear power guaranteeing its future for all ages.
					
					 Today the Korean people are holding fast to Kim Jong Il's patriotism as guideline in building a thriving country.

articles.title: Iran Warns West over Nuclear Talks
articles.content:
Iran Warns West over Nuclear Talks
 Tehran, May 21 (KCNA) -- Ali Akbar Velayati, foreign policy adviser to Seyed Ali Khamenei, leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran, on May 19 warned the West not to enforce its opinion on Iran at the upcoming nuclear talks.
					 Only when the powers observe international law in good faith and not dictate their own views to others, can the talks raise hope, he said. Iran will never allow the foreign forces' pressure on it but make its own decision as regards its nuclear energy project, he added.

articles.title: Reform of Intl Financial System Called for
articles.content:
Reform of Intl Financial System Called for
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Cuban permanent representative at the UN called for reform of the international financial system.
					 Addressing a recent international seminar, he said the present norms and principles of the international financial system are in favor of a few developed countries, he asserted. Such an anti-democratic system should be updated from the foundation.
					
					 The gap between developed countries and developing countries are growing due to neo-liberalism, he said.
					
					 The arch criminal of the on-going economic crisis is developed countries, he said, calling for strengthening south-south cooperation and stepping up regional integration based on mutual respect and solidarity to get rid of the crisis.

articles.title: Thousands Gather in First Major Protest of NATO, G8 Summits
articles.content:
Thousands Gather in First Major Protest of NATO, G8 Summits
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Over 2,000 people rallied in downtown Chicago Friday to protest the policies of G8 and NATO, organizations who protestors believe value wealth and war over the economic hardships currently faced by ordinary people.
					 Demonstrators succeeded in breaking through a police barricade to walk directly on the street, temporarily stalling traffic.

articles.title: Russia Urges Solving Crisis in Political Manner
articles.content:
Russia Urges Solving Crisis in Political Manner
 Moscow, May 21 (KCNA) -- Sergei Narishkin, speaker of the State Duma of Russia, at a meeting on May 16 called for solving critical situation through political ways.
					 The on-going world situation and the regional circumstances of the Collective Security Treaty Organization show that the issue of military security should be given top priority for the Organization, he said.
					
					 In particular, bad attempts to settle the critical issues by force are prevailing in the world, raising concerns of the member states of the Organization, he noted.
					
					 What creates uneasiness is the NATO member nations' activities along the borders of member states of the Organization and the U.S. and NATO's plan to build a missile shield in Europe.
					
					 The Organization would give priority to relieving the crisis through political ways though it has due military potential, he added.

articles.title: Chinese FM Rejects U.S. Military Report on China
articles.content:
Chinese FM Rejects U.S. Military Report on China
 Beijing, May 21 (KCNA) -- Hong Lei, spokesman of the Chinese Foreign Ministry, on May 19 clarified the Chinese government's stand of rejecting the U.S. Defense Department's annual report for 2012 "military and security developments concerning China."
					 He said the U.S. in the report found fault with the just and normal defense construction of China while spreading "theory of military threats from China."
					
					 For China to beef up its limited military capacity is to defend its national independence and territorial integrity as it is not targeted against a specific country or an object, he said.
					
					 A country with no hostility towards China will neither doubt nor worry, he noted, demanding the U.S. side respect the truth and mend its thought and stop releasing such report.

articles.title: Work Posted on Internet Websites of Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Work Posted on Internet Websites of Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The MS Tourist Company of Germany on May 15 posted on its Internet website the full text of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation". The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on May 14 posted the gist of the work on its Internet website.
					 The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee carried the detailed gist of the work in its bulletin on May 15. 
					
					 The work, published on April 27, 2012, deals with the undying feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in land management and indicates the general orientation and tasks for face-lifting the land as befitting that of a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Seminar on Work Held in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Seminar on Work Held in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A seminar on "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun", the work of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, was held by the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea on May 15.
					 M. Gamrul Huda, chairman of the institute, and other speakers said at the seminar that they had an honor of directly hearing the speech of Kim Jong Un at the military parade for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The speech is a great programme which indicated the orientation and ways for exalting the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully building a thriving socialist nation, reunifying the country and realizing global independence, they noted.
					
					 The great Juche idea and the Songun idea are the steadfast guidelines for guaranteeing the invincibility of Korean-style socialism, they stressed.
					
					 Under the care of the President and general secretary Kim Jong Il the Korean People's Army has grown to be the matchless revolutionary army capable of beating back any formidable enemy at one blow, they said. 
					
					 Korean socialism will remain invincible as there is the powerful military muscle capable of shattering the aggression moves of the imperialists at one stroke, they added.

articles.title: MINREX de la RPDC rechaza la provocacion politica del G-8
articles.content:
MINREX de la RPDC rechaza la provocacion politica del G-8
 Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- En entrevista concedida este martes a la ACNC con respecto al parrafo de acusacion a la RPDC incluido en la declaracion de la Cumbre del G-8, el portavoz del MINREX de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					 Condenamos categoricamente y rechazamos totalmente el hecho de que los participantes en la Cumbre del G-8, recien celebrada en Estados Unidos, hayan cuestionado injustamente, a traves de la llamada declaracion de esa reunion, el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos por parte de nuestro pais y nuestro disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa.
					
					 No se puede tolerar nunca la imprudente provocacion politica del G-8 que trata de violar la sagrada soberania de la RPDC con el vicio de apoyar la politica hostil a esta de EE.UU. despreciando la justicia y la verdad.
					
					 Seguiremos ejerciendo dignamente el soberano derecho al lanzamiento de satelite artificial segun el requerimiento indispensable de la construccion de potencia economica frustrando tajantemente todas las tentativas de obstaculizarlo.
					
					 Puesto que nuestro disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa se ha engendrado como consecuencia de la politica hostil de EE.UU. para atropellar a la RPDC con la fuerza, continuara incrementandose y consolidandose mientras prosiga esa politica.
					
					 Existe todavia la via para solucionar de manera pacifica el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana mediante el dialogo y negociaciones, pero ella no se abrira nunca antes de que Estados Unidos demuestre con acciones la cancelacion de su politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					 Para asegurar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula necesarias a la concentracion de todas las energias en el desarrollo pacifico y tomando en  consideracion los puntos preocupantes presentados por la parte norteamericana, avisamos a EE.UU. unas semanas atras que nos contenemos en las acciones si bien nos hemos liberado de los compromisos del Acuerdo RPDC-EE.UU. del 29 de Febrero.
					
					 Desde el principio, nuestro plan era el lanzamiento de satelite cientifico-tecnico de caracter pacifico y no teniamos previsto tomar alguna medida militar como la prueba nuclear.
					
					 Sucede que el que se acobarda primero es el culpable.
					
					 EE.UU., que protagonizo el acto ilegal de cuestionar nuestro lanzamiento de satelite artificial, esta fomentando el enfrentamiento mencionando el rumor de la supuesta "prueba nuclear".
					
					 Si Estados Unidos sigue recurriendo a la campana de sancion y presion pese a nuestros esfuerzos pacifistas, nos veremos obligados a tomar contramedidas para la autodefensa.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta accion ridicula de Ryu U Ik
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta accion ridicula de Ryu U Ik
 Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el ministro de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea, Ryu U Ik, acudio a un taller de ceramica de la provincia de Kyongsang del Norte e hizo ahi un "cantaro de unificacion" que segun el, "simboliza la recogida de fondos" necesarios para la "unificacion".
					 Esa payasada en que Ryu actuo como "ceramista" es un acto malsano para realizar su anejada ambicion de la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" existentes en ambas partes coreanas seduciendo a la opinion publica con la palabra "unificacion".
					
					 Asi subraya el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este martes y continua:
					
					 El "cantaro de unificacion" tiene la mision de recaudar los fondos para la "unificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal".
					
					 El acto de Ryu constituye un desafio frontal a la unanime aspiracion de los coreanos a alcanzar la reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas y una declaracion abierta para enfrentarse hasta el final con la RPDC.
					
					 La banda de Lee Myung Bak, que hace poco, actuo demencialmente para socavar el sagrado regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acusandola del supuesto "problema de inmensos gastos" para los festejos del Dia del Sol, trata ahora de realizar su ambicion de "unificacion de regimenes" con la plata robada a los habitantes.
					
					 Lo que causa mas indignacion es que el traidor Ryu insulto a los compatriotas haciendo referencia a la "reunion de voluntades" y a la "pasion" por la "unificacion". 
					
					 Asi el perpetro imperdonable crimen de vincular el sagrado deseo de la nacion coreana sobre la reunificacion independiente con su criminal intento de la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica cooperacion militar Sur de Corea-Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica cooperacion militar Sur de Corea-Japon
 Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- El circulo militar de Japon y el surcoreano promueven la firma de un convenio militar con vistas al "intercambio de las informaciones sobre el programa nuclear y de misiles" de la RPDC.
					 En un comentario individual divulgado este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de otro paso para desatar la guerra contra la RPDC, y continua:
					
					 Luego de firmar el convenio, los reaccionarios japoneses y los titeres surcoreanos, que buscan su salvacion en la agresion y la guerra, intensificaran el espionaje militar contra la RPDC.
					
					 La suscripcion del convenio seria el ultimo paso hacia la formacion de la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea y un desafio a los esfuerzos de la RPDC y la sociedad internacional por aflojar la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					 La situacion dada demuestra que al garantizar la invasion a la RPDC mediante el intercambio de informaciones, los militaristas japoneses pretenden agredir nuevamente a Corea y dar inicio a la conquista de Asia para satisfacer a toda costa su viejo sueno de la "esfera de coprosperidad de gran Asia oriental".
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea vigilan agudamente las imprudentes maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses para la reagresion a Corea, las cuales llevaran a estos a la derrota y arruinamiento.

articles.title: Noble concepcion del pueblo de Kim Jong Il y Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Noble concepcion del pueblo de Kim Jong Il y Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- Todas las buenas al pueblo y las tareas dificiles a los funcionarios, esto sintetiza la noble concepcion del pueblo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					 El Partido del Trabajo de Corea mantiene su politica de hacer al pueblo vivir en la opulencia bajo el regimen socialista.
					
					 Om Sok Chol, obrero de la Central Termoelectrica de Pyongyang Este, expreso asi a la ACNC:
					
					 Hace poco, tuve el honor de presenciar junto con el Maximo Dirigente el concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu por el Primero de Mayo.
					
					 El vio la funcion con nosotros, los obreros y capitalinos comunes, desde su asiento identico a los que ocupaban los demas espectadores.
					
					 Luego de escuchar las canciones interpretadas por los trabajadores de distintos sectores junto con los artistas, el envio primero los aplausos.
					
					 No olvidare nunca ese momento feliz.
					
					 Jang Kuk Il, subtitular de la Direccion Taesongsan, participo en el trabajo voluntario del viernes luego de recibir la noticia sobre la reciente visita de    Kim Jong Un al Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae.
					
					 Las criticas del Maximo Dirigente hechas ese dia a los funcionarios, que no saben apreciar al pueblo, han sido una advertencia para los que carecen del espiritu de servicio abnegado al pueblo como yo, dijo Jang a la ACNC.
					
					 Trabajare en lo adelante como servidor fiel al pueblo bajo la bandera de patriotismo de Kim Jong Il con la disposicion de alcanzar hasta las estrellas si las quieren las masas populares, concluyo.
